alert.note: Alert for Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 8:59PM EDT until July 21 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT FOR COLUMBIANA...NORTHERN CARROLL...NORTHERN TUSCARAWAS... NORTHWESTERN BEAVER AND SOUTHWESTERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 858 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wooster to 6 miles east of East Palestine, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Trees snapped and uprooted. Power outages can be expected. Locations impacted include... Dover, Salem, Columbiana, East Palestine, Carrollton, Calcutta, Minerva, Ohioville, Lisbon, Strasburg, Leetonia, Industry, New Waterford, Augusta, Malvern, Bolivar, Mineral City, Hanoverton, Rogers, and Parral. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
